Summary: It was shaped like an oval ball of yellowish colored light.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Fenton Township
There were no other sightings in Fenton Township on or around August 27th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was fishing last night (8\27\10) on lake fenton with my son. it was between 11-12 pm my son said "what is that?" i looked and it was a yellowish colored oval light with squiggly lines coming off it. it was about 15' across, about 500 ft. up in the air. no sound at all - it was moving north, blinked off for a split second then blinked again and the light went out. it was not going very fast. we both immediately knew it was not a plane or helicopter. my first thought was i knew it was something that should not have been there. it happened very quickly, and we did not have time to get a picture. last week, there was a stealth plane flying over dickenson lake in holly - another oddity for this area.
